title: Cannot send email via TBird. Get error 10060
content: I receive email fine. The website email works fine. I cannot send email via thunderbird and have not changed my settings which worked for years. my smtp account. I have rebooted my Windows 10 pc numerous times. What can do this? How can I fix this>
